thi-ap28:11.2: pacchimo vattate vayo → pacchimā vattayi vayā (s2, s3) | pacchimo vattati vayo (pts1)
thi-ap28:15.3: Aparādhamajānantī → aparādhaṃ pajānanti (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap28:24.1: Kāmadhātumatikkamma → kāmadhātumatikkantā (bj, s2, s3, pts1, mr)
thi-ap28:25.4: dassayī → buddhānuññā yasodharā. (bj) | ... dassayi (s2, s3) | ... iddhiṃ vidaṃsayiṃ (pts1)
thi-ap28:56.1: Cirānugataṃ dayitaṃ → cirānupari āsīnaṃ (bj) | cirānugataṃ dassitaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap28:67.1: Tassa te → tassa taṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap28:76.4: dvādasa koṭiyo → honti lokagganāyakā (s2, s3) | paññākoṭisatāni ca (pts1)
